title: Assessing pre-season workload variation in professional rugby union players by comparing three acute:Chronic workload ratio models based on playing positions
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Xiangyu Ren, Simon Boisbluche, Kilian Philippe, Mathieu Demy, Xiaopan Hu, Shuzhe Ding, Jacques Prioux
